text: Intumwa y’Imana ibasomera amajambo y’Imana matagatifu agaragaza ibikenewe vyose kugira ngo ibakure bamwe bemeye Imana yabo y’ukuri n’ukugira ibikorwa vyiza, n’ukubakura mumwijima n’ukubinjiza mumuco, n’uwemera Imana yiwe y’ukuri n’ukugira ibikorwa vyiza izo mwinjiza mumajuru aca imbere yiwe inzuzi, baze babeyo mu buzima bwabo bwose n’Imana iramaze kumuha imigisha myiza
